name: Master Dubstep EDM Master
description:
Create amazing sounding dubstep music with our free Master Dubstep.

= Features =
* 38 EDITABLE pads
* 128 powerful HD Drum Loops, Synth Loops, FX, Vocals
* 8 key synth with an insane wobble adjuster
* Individual volume control AND master volume control
* Tempo adjuster for Drum Loops, Synth Loops, Vocals and FX.
* Built-in Metronome

" Hands down the easiest to use Master Dubstep with editable pads I've used so far! "

" WOW, truly amazing app tones of features and great layout. Makes it easy to make sick drops! "

Captivate your live listening audience with powerful high quality Dubstep sounds using Master Dubsmash.

Thank you so much for downloading. We appreciate each & every download.
#fadgames
